history.narrative: Law 6-116 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-165, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 11, 1986 and March 25, 1986, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 8, 1986, it was assigned Act No. 6-151 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
